text: Jon aveji haman laci ala uamalɨ. Aneba nusaŋ ibi iguci avɨli hɨvɨ kulaŋ iamɨgali agɨladɨ mɨŋamɨgu mɨŋaiakalɨ agasaŋ namɨlaŋ hɨji abaman lamahɨdalaŋ uamalɨ. Asɨ agaŋ ibi iguci avɨli hɨvɨ kulaŋ iamɨgali agɨladɨ mɨŋamɨgu mɨŋaiakalɨ uaku kulaŋ agɨlaŋ ibi iguavɨci nɨbu avɨli hɨvɨ kulaŋ iamɨgali agɨladɨ mɨŋamɨgu mɨŋaiakalɨ uamalɨ. Iasaŋ hɨbɨŋ abɨlaŋ igakɨlɨdaŋ uamalɨ.
